La Leche League
028 9581 8118
www.lalecheleagueireland.com
An	international,	non-profit,	non-sectarian	
organisation which, for over 50 years, has been 
dedicated to providing education, information and 
mother-to-mother support and encouragement to 
women who want to breastfeed. LLL Leaders are 
mothers who have themselves breastfed for 12 
months or longer and have undertaken extensive
